title: Twitch recall no sounds?
body: When I play twitch and i recall, the sniffing sounds that he makes in his animation are not there anymore. This happens with every skin i own (all except medieval and whistler village), and it's a minor thing but it bugs me. Am I the only one to notice this?

replies.body:
Hey A Basic Twitch (how fitting you'd be the one reporting this)! 

We'll take a look and see what may have happened to the audio. :]
Thank you! It really bugs me since (obviously) the stinky rat is my favourite champion. All i really have to say on the subject is rito plz :^)
